aboutMe.1: I’m Nicola Valentini, a Web Developer specializing in React, with experience dating back to 2020.
aboutMe.2: I build modern interfaces by turning ideas into responsive and high-performing solutions.
aboutMe.3: I’m currently looking for opportunities in startups where innovation and product quality are a top priority.
aboutMe.4: Let’s connect and see how I can bring value to your team...

whoIAm.1: I’m a Web Developer with a passion for technology and innovation, always looking for new challenges.
whoIAm.2: I design and build modern, fast, user-friendly interfaces — from mockups or even just ideas — that put user experience first.
whoIAm.3: I’ve worked on complex UI projects, including in the banking sector, that required not just clean code, but also attention to UX, scalability, and optimization.
whoIAm.4: My workflow is structured and effective: Analyze – Design – Develop – Optimize. My focus? Functional, responsive, high-performing solutions.
